metadata.title: CVE-2024-41076 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFSv4: Fix memory leak in nfs4_set_security_labelWe leak nfs_fattr and nfs4_label every time we set a security xattr.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
